content.query:
--FOR HTTPS
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseusecasedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', --COMMA SEPERATED FIELD
        ROWTERMINATOR = '/n' --FOR NEW LINE
    ) AS [result]
    
--FOR ABFSS
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseusecasedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

    --examine the data type for the columns -- TO IDENTIFY THE DATA TYPES INFERRED BY SYNAPSE
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT 
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapseusecasedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]'

    --Use WITH clause to provide  explicit data types
    SELECT *
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseusecasedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', --COMMA SEPERATED FIELD
        ROWTERMINATOR = '/n' --FOR NEW LINE
    )
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS [result]

--find collation of our database
SELECT name, collation_name from sys.databases;

--to change the collation to utf collation
 SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseusecasedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', --COMMA SEPERATED FIELD
        ROWTERMINATOR = '/n' --FOR NEW LINE
    )
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
            ) AS [result]

--change collation at database level, can't be done with master databse since its managed by synapse
CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

--SELECT ONLY SUBSET OF COLUMNS
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseusecasedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', --COMMA SEPERATED FIELD
        ROWTERMINATOR = '/n' --FOR NEW LINE
    )
    WITH (
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
            ) AS [result]

--FIX COLUMN NAMES
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseusecasedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    FIRSTROW = 2,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', --COMMA SEPERATED FIELD
    ROWTERMINATOR = '/n' --FOR NEW LINE
    )
    WITH (
        locationID SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
            ) AS [result]

--CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseusecasedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/'
)
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    FIRSTROW = 2,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', --COMMA SEPERATED FIELD
    ROWTERMINATOR = '/n' --FOR NEW LINE
    )
    WITH (
        locationID SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) AS [result]

--second approach for creating external data source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseusecasedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/'
)
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    FIRSTROW = 2,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', --COMMA SEPERATED FIELD
    ROWTERMINATOR = '/n' --FOR NEW LINE
    )
    WITH (
        locationID SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
            ) AS [result]
